comments.author: wgoii2@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

I get a blank screen when I attempt to use Plaxo's gmail sync function. This does not occur with Chrome or IE.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Log into Plaxo.com
2. Go to sync & back-up
3. Attempt to use gmail sync and all that you get is a blank screen.
